divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the back deckon august 10th, 2012 (facing north). A large star appeared to the northeast. The object started out small and white, but then the sphere turned golden-orange, and slowly grew to about the size of a dime. After about two minutes another white object appeared about 2 inches away from the stationary orange sphere.. I sat and observed them for another 3 minutes of so, and they slowly went dim. I observed them turning into what looked like regular stars. During the whole observation, about 5 minutes or so, the orange sphere stayed stationary. The small white sphere orbited the other counter clock-wise.. I have no explanation for what I saw, and I ahve other friends that have seen lights with me on other occasions. I believe that White House, Tn is a UFO hotspot area or something. Please write me back I would really appreciate some feedback about what this could be in my town.. Thank you, HBO
trends: There have been no other sightings in White House
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A stationary orange sphere occompanied by a smaller white sphere.
